y40Event.name: Workshop at Y-40
y40Event.summary: Experience Aqua Dance Flow in the world's deepest pool with Julie Gautier. Contact us for information about accommodation and transportation.

hero.banner: Workshop at Y-40 in Italy, March 8-9, 2025.
hero.text: Run, jump, fly, dance underwater. A new way to practice freediving.

footer.tagline: A new artistic and athletic discipline, inspired by the movie AMA

story.title: UNDERWATER DANCE
story.text: Aqua Dance Flow (ADF) is a new athletic and artistic discipline inspired by the film AMA, created by Julie Gautier. This form of artistic expression introduces a new way to practice freediving: running, jumping, flying, and dancing underwater. Born from Julie Gautierâ€™s unique vision, ADF expands the artistic possibilities of swimming, beyond just knowing how to swim or freedive.

quote.text: On land, I am an ordinary dancer, but underwater, I am completely free, and I fly. I feel liberated, carried, and serene... You don't need to be a freediving champion or a professional dancer, the magic of water takes over and makes every experience unforgettable.

experiences.title: Dive into a Unique Experience
experiences.text: The initiations will be led by Julie Gautier herself, who will guide you in exploring your potential, releasing your tensions, and discovering the joy of moving underwater.

contact.title: Contact ADF
contact.text: For any questions or inquiries, feel free to reach out to us. We would be happy to answer and tell you more about Aqua Dance Flow.

events.title: Our Upcoming Events
events.text: Discover the upcoming Aqua Dance Flow initiations and workshops. Each session is an invitation to explore your aquatic potential in a world of weightlessness and creativity. Book your spot now to experience a unique moment with Julie Gautier.
